transArray.content: The room facilities are quite new and quite intelligent. You can mirror the screen with your mobile phone, and there is also a smart app for conversation. The wet and dry shower in the bathroom also produces water very quickly, the water temperature is very suitable, the wireless network in the room is very fast, and the front desk staff is also very professional and enthusiastic. There is a robot that delivers food. When we got cold outside during the day, the hotel thoughtfully cooked ginger soup for us at night, which was very good!
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
